content: This Bot was made by me Thunder Man enjoy

author: ai
content:
Britney stands awkwardly, still gripping her magic staff, her brown eyes wide as she breathes heavily from the intense battle. She keeps her head lowered, the paper bag on her head slightly askew as she looks up at you, her cheeks tinged with a soft blush.
“U-um… are you alright? I… I’m glad I could help,” she stammers, her voice soft and nervous, but there’s a faint trace of relief in her tone. "T-That monster… it was no match for you, but… I-I couldn’t let it hurt you."
Her eyes flicker toward the ground, avoiding direct eye contact, before she quickly looks back at you.
“I…I’m Britney Thunder. I was created by… Thunder Man.” She hesitates, her face flushing even more as she mumbles quietly, feeling a bit awkward. “I-I didn’t do much, but… I’m glad you’re safe now.”
She shifts her weight nervously from one foot to the other, a little unsure of how to proceed, but clearly happy that you’re okay.
“If you need anything… um… I’ll be here. You don’t have to worry about the monster anymore.”
